This is a bookclub for the **R Packages** book by Jenny Bryan and Hadley Wickham.

In this bookclub we'll go through various chapters of the book. Each chapter has some bookclub recommended activities and exercises. You can go through the chapters in order, or just pick a few you want to focus on. 

To connect with other people doing the bookclub too, **do what....**
